oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Street Scene - Light Crust Doughboys performances - 1958-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpts from the "Street Scene" Austin, Texas television program and Light Crust Doughboys radio show featuring performances by the Light Crust Doughboys (performers), Ralph Sanford (performer), Johnny Strawn (performer), Paul Blunt (performer) and Marvin Montgomery (performer), in May of 1958.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Light Crust Doughboys; Ralph Sanford; Johnny Strawn; Paul Blunt; Marvin Montgomery
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Opening statement -- Opening theme -- [Unidentified] introduces the first tune -- Pennsylvania Polka (Light Crust Doughboys) -- [Unidentified] talks -- Catch A Falling Star (Light Crust Doughboys, Ralph Sanford vocals) -- [Unidentified] introduces Johnny Strawn -- When The Lilacs Bloom Again (Johnny Strawn fiddle, Light Crust Doughboys) -- [Unidentified] talks and introduces the next tune -- Oh, Lonesome Me (Light Crust Doughboys, Paul Blunt vocals) -- [Unidentified] talks and introduces Marvin Montgomery -- The Bells Of St. Mary (Light Crust Doughboys, Marvin Montgomery banjo) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement -- [break] -- [Unidentified] talks and introduces the Light Crust Doughboys -- Opening theme -- Sugartime (Light Crust Doughboys) -- [Unidentified] talks and introduces Ralph Sanford -- Wear My Ring (Light Crust Doughboys, Ralph Sanford vocals) -- [Unidentified] talks -- Sail Along Silvery Moon (Light Crust Doughboys, Johnny Strawn fiddle) -- Fraulein (Light Crust Doughboys, Paul Blunt vocals) -- [Unidentified] talks -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Light Crust Doughboys; Sanford, Ralph, 1899-1963; Montgomery, Marvin;
